document_data.name: Chasen Bell
document_data.mainbody: asen had mid-length light brown hair and pale skin.
document_data.Description: Chasen had mid-length light brown hair and pale skin.
document_data.History: During the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]], Chasen found the hidden underground movements of the drow to be just as concerning as those they could see.
